and ot.order_no = #{form.orderNo}
and ot.port_code = #{form.portCode}
and oi.class_code = #{form.classCode}
and oi.customer_name like concat('%',#{form.customerName},'%')
and ot.legal_name like concat('%',#{form.legalName},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(ot.`created_time`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= #{form.endCreatedTime}
and DATE_FORMAT(ot.`created_time`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= #{form.beginCreatedTime}
AND ot.`status` = 'T_0' AND oi.`status` in ('1','4')
AND ot.`status` = 'T_1'
and ot.`status` = 'T_2'
AND ot.`status` = 'T_3_1'
AND ot.`status` = 'T_3'
AND ot.`status` = 'T_4'
AND ot.`status` = 'T_5' and ot.is_vehicle_weigh = '1'
AND ot.`status` = 'T_7'
AND ot.`status` in ('T_8','T_9_1','T_9_2')
AND ot.`is_hk_clear` = '1' and ot.clear_customs_no is null AND oi.`status` in ('1','4')
and ot.`hk_legal_id` in
#{legalId}
AND ot.`status` = 'T_9'
AND ot.`status` = 'T_10'
AND ot.`status` = 'T_13'
AND ot.`status` = 'T_14'
AND (oi.`status`= 1 or oi.`status`=4)
and oi.`status` IN (1,4) AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM order_payment_cost opc WHERE opc.`main_order_no` = oi.order_no AND opc.`status` = '2' and opc.sub_type = 'zgys') OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM order_receivable_cost orc WHERE orc.`main_order_no` = oi.order_no AND orc.`status` = '2' and orc.sub_type = 'zgys'))
and ot.`legal_entity_id` in
#{legalId}

SELECT ot.`id`, ot.`main_order_no` mainOrderNo, ot.`order_no` orderNo, ot.`status` status, ot.warehouse_info_id, os.vehicle_id vehicleId, os.driver_info_id driverInfoId FROM order_transport ot LEFT JOIN order_send_cars os ON os.order_no = ot.order_no
and ot.`legal_name` in
#{item}
and ot.status != 'T_15' and DATE_FORMAT(ot.created_time, '%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m')
order by id desc

SELECT ot.created_user , count(id) orderNum FROM order_transport ot
and ot.`legal_name` in
#{item}
and DATE_FORMAT(ot.created_time, '%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m')
GROUP BY ot.created_user order by orderNum desc

SELECT ot.`legal_name` legalName, '' enLegalName, '' tel, '' fax, ot.`order_no` orderNo, DATE_FORMAT( ot.`jiedan_time`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) jiedanTimeStr, vi.plate_number licensePlate, vi.hk_number hkLicensePlate, di.phone driverPhone, ifnull(osc.`vehicle_size`,ot.vehicle_size) vehicleSize, ifnull(osc.`vehicle_type`,ot.vehicle_type) vehicleType, ifnull(osc.cntr_no,ot.cntr_no) cntrNo, p.`name` portName, ot.`goods_type` goodsType, '' jiedanUser, si.`supplier_ch_name` clearCustomsAddress, (SELECT su.phone FROM `system_user` su WHERE su.name = ot.`jiedan_user`) jiedanPhone FROM order_transport ot LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ot.`main_order_no` = oi.`order_no` LEFT JOIN order_send_cars osc ON osc.`order_no` = ot.`order_no` LEFT JOIN port_info p ON p.`id_code` = ot.`port_code` left join driver_info di on di.id = osc.driver_info_id left join vehicle_info vi on vi.id = osc.vehicle_id LEFT JOIN supplier_info si ON vi.supplier_id = si.`id` WHERE (oi.`class_code` = 'ZGYS' or oi.class_code='KY')
and ot.order_no = #{orderNo}

select count(*) from order_transport ot LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ot.`main_order_no` = oi.`order_no`
and ot.status=#{status} AND oi.`status` in ('1','4')
AND ot.`status` = 'T_5' and ot.is_vehicle_weigh = '1'
AND ot.`status` in ('T_8','T_9_1','T_9_2')
AND ot.`is_hk_clear` = '1' and ot.clear_customs_no is null AND oi.`status` in ('1','4')
and ot.`hk_legal_id` in
#{legalId}
and ot.status=#{status}
and ot.`legal_entity_id` in
#{legalId}
group by ot.status in ('T_8','T_9_1','T_9_2')
group by ot.status
